SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.ControllerGUI

Class BoardPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ControllerGUI.GenericController
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ControllerGUI.BoardPlayer
public class BoardPlayer extends GenericController
BoardPlayer class manages the scene of the game, along with the shelf, the chat, the board, all the goal cards and the shelves of the other players.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    activeButton(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    activeButton method allows buttons to be raised when you pass over them, becoming opaque.
    void
    chooseColumn(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    chooseColumn method called when the player presses the button of the column number in which he wants to place the Tiles in his shelf
    void
    clearOrderPosition()
    clearOrderPosition method cleans up the Tile Sorting box so that images are removed.
    void
    clickedButtonOK(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    clickedButtonOK method once the player chooses the Tiles from the livingRoom he presses the OK button, so that the change of the choice can be sent to the CommandParsing.
    void
    deactivateButton(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    deactivateButton method turns off the matte effect on the button.
    void
    sendMessage(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    sendMessage method sends the CommandParsing the message the player wants to send once it presses on the specific button.
    void
    setBoardPlayer(GameView gameView)
    setBoardPlayer method sets the entirety of the game window, i.e. the board, the shelves, the chat, and the goal cards.
    void
    setEmptyTileEndGame()
    setEmptyTileEndGame method is called in case a player gets the End of Game Token and then it is removed from the GUI, so that it is no longer shown.
    void
    setInnerShadowTile(javafx.scene.image.ImageView tile)
    setInnerShadowTile method adds the effect (Yellow outline) to the ImageView of the Tile, which indicates that it has been selected by the player in the LivingRoom. if instead you just hover over it, it becomes opaque.
    void
    setLabelTurn(String turnOf)
    setLabelTurn method sets in the gui the messages to be shown to the player.
    void
    setLivingRoom(LivingRoomView livingRoomView)
    livingRoomView method that sets the livingRoom to show.
    void
    setMessageEntry(String fromPerson, String message, String idChat)
    setMessageEntry method shows the message sent by the player or those arrived by other players in the GUI.
    void
    setScoreCGC(int token)
    setScoreCGC method ets the scores of the player (Client) itself in case it gets Tokens so that they are shown in the GUI.
    void
    setTileOrderPosition()
    setTileOrderPosition method sets the sorting box in order to show the player the chosen tiles and be able to make them hate them.
    void
    setToken(GameView gameView)
    setToken method sets the tokens that are shown in the GUI to the player, so that if they are taken, it shows the scaling of the score.
    void
    showDescriptionCGC(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    showDescriptionCGC method show the description of the CGC being pressed.
    void
    updateBoard(LivingRoomView livingRoomView)
    updateBoard method that updates the GUI Board.
    void

    updateShelfClient method that updates the player's shelf.
    void
    updateShelfOthers(ArrayList<ShelfView> shelfViews)
    updateShelfOthers method updates the Shelf of all players.

  • Method Details

    • setBoardPlayer

      public void setBoardPlayer(GameView gameView)
      setBoardPlayer method sets the entirety of the game window, i.e. the board, the shelves, the chat, and the goal cards.
      Parameters:
      gameView - - contains the updated view of the game.

    • updateShelfOthers

      public void updateShelfOthers(ArrayList<ShelfView> shelfViews)
      updateShelfOthers method updates the Shelf of all players.
      Parameters:
      shelfViews - - list of all players except the player himself.

    • setToken

      public void setToken(GameView gameView)
      setToken method sets the tokens that are shown in the GUI to the player, so that if they are taken, it shows the scaling of the score.
      Parameters:
      gameView - - contains the updated view of the game.

    • setScoreCGC

      public void setScoreCGC(int token)
      setScoreCGC method ets the scores of the player (Client) itself in case it gets Tokens so that they are shown in the GUI.
      Parameters:
      token - - token number.

    • setEmptyTileEndGame

      public void setEmptyTileEndGame()
      setEmptyTileEndGame method is called in case a player gets the End of Game Token and then it is removed from the GUI, so that it is no longer shown.

    • showDescriptionCGC

      public void showDescriptionCGC(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      showDescriptionCGC method show the description of the CGC being pressed.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - - if the player presses on the CGC image, it calls the event.

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard(LivingRoomView livingRoomView)
      updateBoard method that updates the GUI Board.
      Parameters:
      livingRoomView - - contains the updated view of the livingroom.

    • setLivingRoom

      public void setLivingRoom(LivingRoomView livingRoomView)
      livingRoomView method that sets the livingRoom to show.
      Parameters:
      livingRoomView - - contains the updated view of the livingroom.

    • updateShelfClient

      public void updateShelfClient(ShelfView shelfView)
      updateShelfClient method that updates the player's shelf.
      Parameters:
      shelfView - - contains the updated view of the shelf.

    • chooseColumn

      public void chooseColumn(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      chooseColumn method called when the player presses the button of the column number in which he wants to place the Tiles in his shelf
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - - event of the player pressing on the button.

    • clickedButtonOK

      public void clickedButtonOK(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      clickedButtonOK method once the player chooses the Tiles from the livingRoom he presses the OK button, so that the change of the choice can be sent to the CommandParsing.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - - event of the button pressed by the player.

    • activeButton

      public void activeButton(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      activeButton method allows buttons to be raised when you pass over them, becoming opaque.
      Parameters:
      event - - event of the button pressed by the player.

    • deactivateButton

      public void deactivateButton(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      deactivateButton method turns off the matte effect on the button.
      Parameters:
      event - - event of the button pressed by the player

    • setInnerShadowTile

      public void setInnerShadowTile(javafx.scene.image.ImageView tile)
      setInnerShadowTile method adds the effect (Yellow outline) to the ImageView of the Tile, which indicates that it has been selected by the player in the LivingRoom. if instead you just hover over it, it becomes opaque.
      Parameters:
      tile - - ImageView of the tile selected by the player in the LivingRoom.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      sendMessage method sends the CommandParsing the message the player wants to send once it presses on the specific button.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - - event of the button pressed by the player.

    • setMessageEntry

      public void setMessageEntry(String fromPerson, String message, String idChat)
      setMessageEntry method shows the message sent by the player or those arrived by other players in the GUI.
      Parameters:
      fromPerson - - string of the name from whom the message arrives.
      message - - string of the sent or incoming message.
      idChat - - name from whom the message is directed.

    • setLabelTurn

      public void setLabelTurn(String turnOf)
      setLabelTurn method sets in the gui the messages to be shown to the player.
      Parameters:
      turnOf - - string of the message to be shown.

    • clearOrderPosition

      public void clearOrderPosition()
      clearOrderPosition method cleans up the Tile Sorting box so that images are removed.

    • setTileOrderPosition

      public void setTileOrderPosition()
      setTileOrderPosition method sets the sorting box in order to show the player the chosen tiles and be able to make them hate them.
